channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Similar Posts – Best Related Posts Plugin for WordPress
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Similar Posts – Best Related Posts Plugin for WordPress

item.title: CVE-2021-24537|2024-08-03T19:35:20.024Z -- unknown -- similar%20posts%20%E2%80%93%20best%20related%20posts%20plugin%20for%20wordpress
item.description: The Similar Posts WordPress plugin through 3.1.5 allow high privilege users to execute arbitrary PHP code in an hardened environment (ie with DISALLOW_FILE_EDIT, DISALLOW_FILE_MODS and DISALLOW_UNFILTERED_HTML set to true) via the 'widget_rrm_similar_posts_condition' widget setting of the plugin.
